LanguageData.VME_TerribleCeremonialSuicide.stages.0.d: That ceremonial suicide was terrible. The blade was thrust laterally and there was blood and entrails everywhere. Disgusting!
LanguageData.VME_BoringCeremonialSuicide.stages.0.des: That ceremonial suicide was not good. The speech seemed forced. At the very least we have restored the honor of our colony.
A honorable ceremonial suicide. The shadow of defeat no longer clouds our minds.
LanguageData.VME_UnforgettableCeremonialSuicide.stage: That ceremonial suicide was unforgettable! Everyone will remember the courage, self-control, and strong resolve. The honor of our colony is now spotless.
